name: The Plan - Shaun of the Dead
description: Shaun explains his zombie survival plan with Edgar Wright's signature match-cut montage. Classic comedic sequence.
location: Multiple: Shaun's flat, suburban streets, Mum's house, Liz's flat, Winchester pub

shots.subject: Ed
shots.dialog: Why don't we go to the Winchester?

shots.subject: Shaun speaking
shots.dialog: Okay. We take Pete's car, go round Mum's, go in, deal with Philip, grab Mum, go to Liz's, pick her up, bring her back here, go to the Winchester, have a nice cold pint, and wait for all this to blow over.
shots.photo_prompt: Close-up of blonde man with receding hairline and stubble, blood scratch marks on right cheek, wearing dark grey-blue jacket over white shirt with loosened red tie, standing in front of teal-green wall with white picture frame visible behind him, speaking earnestly with determined expression, desaturated cinematic color grading, soft diffused daylight, film grain, 2.35:1 widescreen

shots.subject: Group drinking
shots.photo_prompt: Medium shot of four people drinking at pub table. Blonde woman on left drinking from glass, blonde man center-left drinking pint with satisfied expression, older woman in purple and grey drinking wine on right, heavyset man partially visible far right. Dark traditional pub interior background with bar, mirrors, bottles. Warm amber pub lighting, casual celebratory moment, British comedy film style
shots.motion_prompt: Group drinks from glasses simultaneously, lowering drinks with satisfied expressions, then settles

shots.subject: Shaun drinking
shots.photo_prompt: Medium close-up of blonde man with receding hair drinking from pint glass, eyes looking up/sideways with slightly surprised expression while drinking. Dark jacket, white shirt collar, red tie visible. Blonde woman in light blue partially visible on left edge. Dark pub interior background blurred, woman walking visible in far background. Warm pub lighting, comedic timing moment, British pub atmosphere
shots.motion_prompt: Man drinks deeply from pint, eyes dart to side with realization, slowly lowers glass, then holds with concerned look

shots.subject: Motion blur back to flat
shots.photo_prompt: Heavy motion blur whip pan frame, ghostly blonde figure in dark jacket visible through blur streaks. Teal green color emerging through blur indicating transition back to flat location. Edgar Wright signature rapid transition, extreme motion blur, cinematic punctuation
shots.motion_prompt: Violent whip pan motion blur sweeping across frame, colors streak, then snaps to sharp focus

shots.subject: Shaun determined
shots.photo_prompt: Close-up of blonde man with receding hairline speaking with determined expression, mouth open mid-word. Stubble on face, blood marks on cheek. White shirt collar, red tie, dark jacket. Teal green wall behind with blurred bookshelf and globe visible. Cinematic shallow depth of field, practical lighting, British comedy horror aesthetic, 35mm film grain
shots.motion_prompt: Man speaks with conviction, eyebrows raised, slight head nods for emphasis, then expression settles

shots.subject: Shaun arms spread
shots.photo_prompt: Medium shot of blonde man standing with arms spread in questioning gesture, wearing white shirt with blood stains, red tie, dark open jacket. Dark-haired man's back of head visible in lower left foreground. Teal walls behind, wooden bookshelf with books, globe, green bottle. CRT TV showing news broadcast in lower right corner. Messy British flat interior, practical lighting, cinematic framing
shots.motion_prompt: Standing man gestures with both hands spread wide, explaining plan, arms lower to sides, then holds position

shots.subject: Ed swinging bat
shots.photo_prompt: Medium shot of heavyset man with dark messy hair swinging bloody cricket bat with excited expression, mouth open yelling. Wearing dirty beige 'I GOT WOOD' t-shirt with blood stains. Teal walls behind, messy flat interior with dining table, window with blinds, bottles visible. Blonde man's back partially visible on right. Motion blur on bat swing, dynamic action pose, British comedy horror style, practical lighting
shots.motion_prompt: Man swings cricket bat overhead enthusiastically while shouting, bat arcs through air with motion blur, then brings bat down to rest

shots.subject: Ed and Shaun
shots.photo_prompt: Two-shot of heavyset man on left holding bloody cricket bat up proudly, wearing beige 'I GOT WOOD' t-shirt with blood stains. Blonde man on right in dark jacket, white shirt, red tie, looking at Ed. Teal walls behind with posters, window, wall-mounted cup dispensers visible. Spiky black plant/decoration in foreground. Messy flat interior, practical lighting from above and window, British comedy horror film style
shots.motion_prompt: Man on left holds bat proudly while speaking, man on right turns to look at him, subtle movements, then both settle

shots.subject: TV news - CRISIS WORSENS
shots.photo_prompt: Insert shot of CRT television screen showing news broadcast. Male news anchor in dark suit, blue shirt, purple tie seated at desk. Red and white 'NEWS FLASH' and 'BREAKING NEWS - CRISIS WORSENS' graphics on lower third. Blue-lit news studio background with other personnel visible. CRT TV frame and speakers visible on edges, dark room visible on sides with silhouettes of people watching. Practical TV glow lighting, diegetic news broadcast, British television aesthetic
shots.motion_prompt: News anchor speaks on screen, slight TV scan lines flicker, graphics static, silhouettes on sides shift slightly, then holds

shots.subject: Ed and Shaun profile
shots.photo_prompt: Two-shot profile view of heavyset man with dark messy hair on left holding bloody cricket bat, wearing dirty beige 'I GOT WOOD' t-shirt, speaking with earnest expression. Blonde man on right in dark jacket facing him in profile, blood mark on cheek visible, listening. Teal walls behind with posters, spiky plant decoration in foreground center. British flat interior, practical lighting, conversational framing, shallow depth of field
shots.motion_prompt: Man on left speaks while gesturing with bat in hand, man on right listens and nods slightly, then both settle

shots.subject: Ed speaking, Shaun moving
shots.photo_prompt: Two-shot of heavyset man on left with bloody cricket bat, beige 'I GOT WOOD' t-shirt, speaking. Blonde man on right in dark jacket bending down or reaching for something, blood on shirt visible, determined expression. Teal walls with posters behind, 'PAGEBOY' text visible on wall decoration. Spiky plant in foreground. Messy British flat, practical lighting, dynamic character movement, British comedy horror aesthetic
shots.motion_prompt: Man on left continues speaking while man on right bends to grab something, fabric rustles, action movement, then both settle into new positions

audio_layers.note: Queen - Don't Stop Me Now during visualization sequences

edgar_wright_techniques: Rapid match cuts on action words
Insert shots of mundane objects (doorbell, mug, etc.)
